Plot: 'The Girl from Nagasaki' is a 3D feature film production of the classic Puccini Opera 'Madam Butterfly,' directed by world renown photographer Michel Comte. It's a modern day tale that ...
Title: The Girl from Nagasaki
Writer: Michel Comte, Anne-Marie Mackay, Ayako Yoshida
